result.execSummary:
The defendant Mark P. PLAGEMANN was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft as repeater-Movable Property >$5000-$10,000 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 as repeater [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: To Donald (Scott) Remaker at 9932 County Road JJ, Manitowoc, WI.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain full-time employment or work search.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Submit a DNA sample and pay surcharge.

Have no contact with Donald (Scott) Remaker, his residence or any business or real estate he owns.

Have no contact with Badgerland Aggregates.
AODA assessment and follow through counseling.

ADDRESS INFO for Mark P. PLAGEMANN

Notice of Intent to Certify Debt to the Wisconsin Department of Revenue
DOC Balance Inquiry
It is ordered that the victim in this matter, Donald S. Remaker, 9932 CORD JJ, Manitowoc, WI  54220 is hereby awarded a judgment against the defendant, Mark P. Plagemann in the sum of $4,500.00.
It is ordered that the victim in this matter, Badgerland Aggregates, PO Box 387, Two Rivers, WI  54241 is hereby awarded a judgment against the defendant, Mark P. Plagemann, in the sum of $1,524.94.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant is before the Court for sentencing, his probation having been revoked effective 02-06-20.   
Defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail as follows:   
Count 1 - Defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for twelve (12) months, under the Huber Law.   
Count 2- Defendant is sentenced to the Manitowoc County Jail for nine (9) months, under the Huber Law, concurrent with count 1.  
Defendant is given credit for sixty-seven (67) days already served.   
Court costs are converted to a civil judgment.   
Court further orders civil judgment's of restitution against the defendant and in favor of the Donald Remaker in the amount of $4,500.00 and in favor of Badgerland Aggregates in the amount of $1,524.94.   
Minutes.
Nathan Heim, Public Defender.
